question: Which Indian state/UT provides an incentive of Rs 2000 per migrant after successful completion of quarantine period?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Odisha Naveen Patnaik had earlier announced that the state would provide an incentive of Rs 2000 per migrant after successful completion of quarantine period.
Recently, the proposed incentives have been paid to 1,10,080 people, as per the Health and Family Welfare Department of the state. For this incentive disbursal, â‚¹19.03 crore have been spent from the Chief Minister Relief Fund.
